name: Izzy Stradlin
description:
'''Jeffrey Dean Isbell''' (born April 8, 1962), known professionally as '''Izzy Stradlin''', is an American guitarist, singer, and songwriter. He was a co-founder, rhythm guitarist, and backing vocalist of the [[hard rock]] band [[Guns N' Roses]], with whom he recorded four studio albums and left at the height of their fame in 1991.

Following his departure from Guns N' Roses, Stradlin fronted his own rock band, [[#1992â€“1994: Ju Ju Hounds and first return to Guns N' Roses|Izzy Stradlin and the Ju Ju Hounds]], before continuing to record as a solo artist. He was inducted into the [[Rock and Roll Hall of Fame]] as a member of Guns N' Roses in 2012.
